Package org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging

Interface Summary
CallDetective This interface is used to determine who called us.
Log A simple logging interface abstracting logging APIs based in Apache Jakarta logging.
LogAttributes A simple interface to modify logging attributes for all subset of loggers when possible.
LogLevel A simple logging interface abstracting logging APIs based in Apache Jakarta logging.
LogMessage To send standard output.
LogRegistration Interface for registering and deregistering logs
LogRemote A simple logging interface abstracting logging APIs based in Apache Jakarta logging.
LogSF A simple logging interface abstracting logging APIs based in Apache Jakarta logging.
LogToFile Logs log info into a file.
LogToNothing  
LogToPrim Logs log info into a prim that implements Log interface

SFLogStdStream Defines the attributes for ExampleTemplate component.
SFPrimLog Defines the attributes for SFLog component.

LogAsyncQueue LogAsyncQueue implements a queue of log method invocations with methods to enqueue and dequeue requests.
